Name: Ramos Chocolate Fizz cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
5 ml Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
TOP with sparkling wine slowly poured into glass from a height to create and raise thick foamy head.
Garnish with chocolate truffle on rim.
Review: Creamy chocolate vanilla fudge with faint orange and a hint of gin.
History: Created 4th February 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Ramos Chocolate Fizz cocktail contains 319 calories
